snippet.title: 7  Visibility, Metrics, and Flow
snippet.description:
📊 If You Can’t See Your Flow, You Can’t Improve It
🎥 Episode 7 of 10 — From Legacy to Engineering Excellence with Azure DevOps

You're building products.
You’re making decisions.
But here’s the hard truth:

📉 If you’re not tracking real data—you're just guessing.

✅ Lead time
✅ Cycle time
✅ WIP limits
✅ Flow efficiency

These are the signals that actually show how your teams are working. And yet—most teams still rely on gut feel.

At NKD Agility, we help you shift to data-driven delivery with Azure DevOps:
🔍 Built-in telemetry from every work item
📈 Basic metrics like lead time, cycle time, cumulative flow
🧠 Full data access via APIs + Power BI for custom dashboards
⚙️ Third-party tools like FlowViz (free) and ActionableAgile (powerful) for clarity at scale

Whether you're a small team or a massive enterprise, the key to continuous improvement is simple:

Make the work visible.

📌 Ready to stop guessing and start optimizing? Visit https://nkdagility.com

👇 Watch now. Follow the full 10-part series to unlock visibility with Azure DevOps.
#AzureDevOps #FlowMetrics #DeliveryFlow #EngineeringExcellence #TechLeadership #MakeWorkVisible #NKDAgility #MartinHinshelwood #DevOpsTelemetry #DataDrivenDelivery
